title: 52: The Consolation of Philosophy
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: This is both our one year anniversary and our first (successfully recorded) live episode! This took place at the annual Paideia Conference at Veritas Academy. We hope to see you there next year!
itunes:author: BEEZ HEEZ & GEEZ
itunes:subtitle: When you're sad and all alone, philosophy to the rescue
